samplers

Class Sampler_UCB

  • java.lang.Object
    • samplers.Sampler_UCB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISampler

    public class Sampler_UCB
extends Object
implements ISampler
    Implements upper confidence bound for trees (UCBT, UCT, UCB, depending on who you ask). Key feature is that it lets the user define a value, c, that weights exploration vs exploitation.
    Author:
    Matt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float c
      Explore/exploit tradeoff parameter.
      static float explorationMultiplier
      A multiplier to tone down or amp up exploration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sampler_UCB(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction)
      Must provide an evaluationFunction to get a numeric score for nodes after a rollout.

      Strategy for adding a single node at a depth of 1 greater than the given startNode.

      Lets the sampler know that the previously requested game moves have occurred and the tree FSM is ready to do more stuff.

      Are we ready to switch from expansion policy to rollout policy?

    • Field Detail

      • c

        public float c
        Explore/exploit tradeoff parameter. Higher means more exploration. Lower means more exploitation.

      • explorationMultiplier

        public static float explorationMultiplier
        A multiplier to tone down or amp up exploration. Higher means more exploration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sampler_UCB

        public Sampler_UCB(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction)
        Must provide an evaluationFunction to get a numeric score for nodes after a rollout.
